markdownRemark.html:
I just wrapped up a post on a technical detail, so I’d like to balance it out with some more literary stuff. Writing about writing is inevitable, kind of like movies about making movies.

Some of the early notes for this project

frontmatter.title: Coding Interview Questions I've Been Asked
